channel.title: Unable to edit your post? Look here!
channel.description: Hey guys, The forums now have a feature that disables post editing after two weeks. That said, this feature takes effect in the advertisements board as well. If you are unable to edit your post at any time, either post in this thread with your postlocked advertisement or go ahead and message myself or a global moderator and we'll go ahead and reset the post timer for you. Just so everyone knows, the current timer is set at two weeks. This is not a thread to argue or question the existence of the edit timer, so please refrain from doing so. Thanks, and happy advertising!

item.title: Unable to edit your post? Look here!
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“Justin Bieber, post:13, topic:540868”][quote author=Ashi link=topic=659735.msg4429077#msg4429077 date=1402338168]

[quote author=zuppers link=topic=659735.msg4411718#msg4411718 date=1393975489]

But why is there such feature , Is it necessary?
[/quote]It was included in the forum upgrade, it stops people from editing post that were made ages ago. It’s a useful feature but has it’s drawbacks in this section & a few others.

What if you made a typo ages ago that you just noticed? Everybody has a reason for editing their posts. I really don’t think this was needed.
[/quote]If you need to edit a post then please PM a member of staff.[/quote]
It could become very common for people to request messages to be edited. Do staff really need that work load?

Read full topic

item.title: Unable to edit your post? Look here!
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:9, topic:540868”][quote author=zuppers link=topic=659735.msg4411718#msg4411718 date=1393975489]

But why is there such feature , Is it necessary?
[/quote]It was included in the forum upgrade, it stops people from editing post that were made ages ago. It’s a useful feature but has it’s drawbacks in this section & a few others.

I feel like this really backfires in the dev sections
So does this apply to all topics or simply topics that haven’t been edited in two weeks? Because if it’s all topics that pretty much gives dev topics a two week lifespan which is horrible[/quote]It applies to all topics in all sections, it looks at when the last edit of a post was to see if it’s been 2 weeks.

Read full topic

[/quote]It was included in the forum upgrade, it stops people from editing post that were made ages ago. It’s a useful feature but has it’s drawbacks in this section & a few others.[/quote]
I feel like this really backfires in the dev sections
So does this apply to all topics or simply topics that haven’t been edited in two weeks? Because if it’s all topics that pretty much gives dev topics a two week lifespan which is horrible

Read full topic
